Games Rules Welcome!
Welcome to Guess K-pop app! In this application, you can test your knowledge of K-pop. You are offered 3 main game modes: "\n" 1) Guess the Star "\n" 2) Guess the Group "\n" 3) Divide to bands (coming soon!)"\n" With these game modes, you can memorize all of K-pop most famous bands, as well as all of their incredible members! "\n" Each game mode has achievements! "\n" Good luck! :)
//scorestuff Your score
TwoBandsTinder
Achievement unlocked!
New record! Congratulations! You have reached new record: Game over Your score: Your record About game mode
GuessStar game mode lets you test your knowledge of K-pop stars. "\n" Guess the names of K-pop artists from photos. It is not important for you to know which group a star is on screen, but it is important to know his or her name. You have 3 lives. Each artist you guess will increase your score! A wrong guess, accordingly, reduces your lives. If you lose all lives, game will be ended. But I think you can figure it out. "\n" Good luck! :)
GuessBand game mode lets you test your knowledge of the most famous K-pop groups in the history! "\n" Guess band name use artist on the screen. You have 3 lives and 3 hints. Each correct answer will increase your score! And the wrong one, accordingly, reduces your lives. Off course, if all lives will be lost, game will be ended. Hints help you with usage symbols. Every tenth band will restore 1 life, and every fifteenth band give extra hint. But I think you can figure it out. "\n" Good luck! ;)
The game mode "Divide to bands" allows you to test your knowledge of K-pop groups "\n" You are given a set of different K-pop stars, and you need to divide them into 2 groups. To distribute the artist cards, you need to swipe them to the corresponding K-pop group on the side of the screen. "\n" At any time, you can view all artist cards and redistribute them. If you distribute the cards incorrectly, you will also be asked to correct the result. But with each new attempt, the potential score will get smaller. "\n" But I think you can figure it out. "\n" Distribute them all! ãƒ„
